title: Lovina Beach Dolphin Watch (Half-day)
overview: Experience calm waters and black sand, with a morning dolphin-watching boat trip at Lovina Beach.

stops.description: Depart early from Sakala Resort Bali for Lovina.
Arrive and join a dolphin-watching boat tour.
Relax in nearby Banjar Hot Springs.
Enjoy lunch at a beachside café.

title: Lovina Beach & North Bali (Full-day)
overview: A full day exploring Lovina Beach, dolphin watching, hot springs, and North Bali sights.

stops.description: Depart early from Sakala Resort Bali for Lovina.
Dolphin watching and relaxing on the black sand beach.
Soak in the natural hot springs nearby.
Visit the largest Buddhist monastery in Bali.
Return to the beach to swim or relax before heading back.
